TopicTitle: The 0.25 Waiting Room, now boarding passengers heading to Hypetown

Judging by the poll results, the hypevehicle will be airborne which makes sense given that this is a aerospace game. All aboard the Hype(Space)PlaneShuttle!!!

Also, new devnotes will be released today: HYPE++!!!

So since they were expecting to show off the new "top secret thing" this Friday on squadcast, I assume that is a pretty clear indication we won't get .25 this week. But after that...who knows right?

So since they were expecting to show off the new "top secret thing" this Friday on squadcast, I assume that is a pretty clear indication we won't get .25 this week. But after that...who knows right?

Or it could be a clever ruse to keep the hype under control. I had hoped they would tell us today in the notes.

I'm personally hoping for after this weekend as I've got guests in town until Monday. Amusingly, I recall that when 0.24 came out I was out of town the weekend before and unable to play as well.

Guys! I think I cracked the code. They release whenever I'm on vacation or have guests, and can't play the game.

I obviously need more vacations. And I'm willing to do just that. For you all.
I'd like a nice,comfy seat on the HypeTrain, please. Time to get nice and cozy while everyone around me is hyped up and HYPE-PARTYING.
